question:
You are studying for a qualification, and you would like some time off work to complete it.
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:

1)Ask for some time off to complete a qualification.
2)Suggest what you will do later at work if you have time off.
3)Say how the qualification helps your job or company.
text: I am writing to request for a leave of absence in order to complete my final year masters degree examination starting on the 5th of May, 2019.
I am currently studying for my masters in English language and I will like to request for two weeks off work so as to fully prepare and write my final exams.
Although I will not be around during the most crucial time the school needs me, I intend working extra hours without pay upon my return, in order to cover for my time off work.

It has always ~being~ been my dream to further my studies. Now that I have an opportunity for a certification in English Language, this will not only be a stepping stone in my career, but it will also improve the quality of service I provide for the institution. Furthermore, this degree will equip me with the communication skills required to handle the yearly managerial meetings, which the school is currently having problems hosting.
I look forward to your favourable response.
